comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: John Purroy Mitchel was elected (on a fusion ticket) to succeed Acting Mayor Ardolph Loges Kline. Kline, the head of the Board of Aldermen, had become acting mayor when Mayor William Jay Gaynor died, on September 10, 1913. Kline filled out Gaynor's term until the end of the year.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Election was on November 4, 1913. See www.thehistorybox.com/factual_first/1900s_3.html and query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D03E3DF173DE633A...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for the additional information.  We'll add the date of the election to the record the next time we update it.
